channel.title: Latest PHMSA Hazardous Materials Incident Reports, for NC

item.title: Report X-2023081649
item.description:
Report X-2023081649

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-21T15:10:31+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-22
  • City: NEWTON
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Package found in unload area at the end of sort by QA. Package was bagged into a hazardous materials bag and into a red hazmat tote to prevent more leakage. Liquid only soiled fiberboard box and none spilled on floor. Package kept upright to prevent loose cap from leaking more into packaging DescribePack: Package failure contains a plastic container of liquid cleaner with one loose cap causing liquid contents to spill through outer packaging. no internal packaging present to prevent damage on impact. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Damaged Hazmat was put into a hazardous materials bag and into a red tote to prevent further spillage

item.title: Report X-2023081579
item.description:
Report X-2023081579

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-20T15:12:40+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-18
  • City: KERNERSVILLE
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: package was found on the dock with wet outer packaging. package was then placed in a salvage drum DescribePack: upon investigation, one of the bottles inside of the package had a loose cap, causing internal leakage DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: package was placed inside of a hazardous waste bag, and then into a salvage drum

  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: Jerrican was found with wet outter, and was noticed to have been leaking from closure lid. DescribePack: Jerrican lid seemed to have not been all the way sealed, causing leakage DurationRel: 0 and MitigateEffect: Jerrican was placed into plastic hazardous waste bag, and then into a salvage drum

item.title: Report X-2023081275
item.description:
Report X-2023081275

Identified by scraper @ 2023-09-19T15:12:14+00:00

  • Incident Date: 2023-08-15
  • City: KERNERSVILLE
  • State: NC
  • Report Type: A hazardous material incident
  • Mode Of Transportation: Highway
  • Carrier/Reporter: Fedex Ground Package System, Inc.
  • Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Hazmat Injuries: 0
  • Non-Hazmat Fatalities: 0
  • Description: SequenceEvent: One of our unload managers brought over the hazmat I asked him what happened and he replied the hazmat began to become wet once they were placing it on the belt to go to the unloads. DescribePack: The box was wet on one side and the box looked like it was about to begin falling apart. DurationRel: 1 and MitigateEffect: Moment i noticed the release starting I immediately placed the hazmat in a lined tote.
